title: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas: Vocal Selections Piano, Vocal and Guitar Chords
description: (Vocal Selections). 13 vocal selections from the bawdy Broadway musical: The Aggie Song * The Bus from Amarillo * Doatsy Mae * Girl You're a Woman * Good Old Girl * Hard Candy Christmas * The Sidestep * Texas Has a Whorehouse in It * Watch Dog Theme * and more. Includes a special section of full-color photos from the production!
author: Carol          Hall
